trans-unit.source: A field must have at least one value
trans-unit.target: A field must have at least one value

trans-unit.source: Values must be separated by a ",". A values list must end with ";" or ")"
trans-unit.target: Values must be separated by a ",". A values list must end with ";" or ")"

trans-unit.source: Cannot close group as this field is not in a group
trans-unit.target: Cannot close group as this field is not in a group

trans-unit.source: A group logical operator can only be used at the start of the input or before a group opening
trans-unit.target: A group logical operator can only be used at the start of the input or before a group opening

trans-unit.source: Spaces are not allowed within an operator
trans-unit.target: Spaces are not allowed within an operator

trans-unit.source: A value containing spaces must be surrounded by quotes
trans-unit.target: A value containing spaces must be surrounded by quotes

trans-unit.source: A value containing special characters must be surrounded by quotes
trans-unit.target: A value containing special characters must be surrounded by quotes

trans-unit.source: A value containing quotes must be surrounded by quotes
trans-unit.target: A value containing quotes must be surrounded by quotes

trans-unit.source: Quotes in a quoted value must be escaped
trans-unit.target: Quotes in a quoted value must be escaped

trans-unit.source: Missing quote to end the value
trans-unit.target: Missing quote to end the value
